languages.text: "Ах, я снова чувствую это... умиротворение. Души предков обрели покой, и скверна больше не угрожает ни Монолиту душ, ни этому миру". {n}Узкие плечи Арлекина, наконец, выглядят полностью расслабленными.{/n} "Не забудь о нашем соглашении, Кассия Орселлио. Скоро мы встретимся вновь на этом же месте, и ты передашь нам осколки монолита".

traits.locale_text: "Ах, я снова чувствую это... умиротворение. Души предков обрели покой, и скверна больше не угрожает ни камню Душ, ни этому миру". {n}Узкие плечи Арлекина, наконец, выглядят полностью раслабленными.{/n} "Не забудь о нашем соглашении, Кассия Орселлио. Скоро мы встретимся вновь на этом же месте, и ты передашь нам осколки камня".

languages.text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."
languages.original_text: "Ах, я снова чувствую это... умиротворение. Души предков обрели покой, и скверна больше не угрожает ни Монолиту душ, ни этому миру". {n}Узкие плечи Арлекина, наконец, выглядят полностью расслабленными.{/n} "Не забудь о нашем соглашении, Кассия Орселлио. Скоро мы встретимся вновь на этом же месте, и ты передашь нам осколки монолита".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and taint no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

The ancestral souls have found peace and vice no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

"Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

languages.text: 「ああ、また感じる…平穏だ。祖先の魂は安らぎを感じてる、もう腐敗がモノリスにもこの星にも危険を及ぼすことはないね」{n}ハーレクィンは狭い肩幅を、今ではすっかりくつろげている。{/n}「契約を忘れるな、カシア・オーセリオ。かけらを僕に渡すんだぞ、この場所ですぐ再会しよう」
languages.original_text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、また感じる…平穏だ。祖先の魂は安らぎを感じてる、もう悪行がモノリスにもこの星にも危険を及ぼすことはないね」{n}ハーレクィンは狭い肩幅を、今ではすっかりくつろげている。{/n}「契約を忘れるな、カシア・オーセリオ。かけらを僕に渡すんだぞ、この場所ですぐ再会しよう」

languages.text: “啊，我有感觉到了……宁静。先祖的灵魂得到了安息，腐化不再危害灵魂石与这个世界。”{n}丑角狭窄的肩膀看起来已经完全放松下来了。{/n}“要记得我们的约定，卡西娅·奥赛罗。我们很快还会在这个地方见面，到时候你可以把碎片交给我们。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

traits.locale_text: “啊，我有感觉到了……宁静。先祖的灵魂得到了安息，暴行不再危害灵魂石与这个世界。”{n}丑角狭窄的肩膀看起来已经完全放松下来了。{/n}“要记得我们的约定，卡西娅·奥塞罗。我们很快还会在这个地方见面，到时候你可以把碎片交给我们。”

languages.text: « Ah, je peux de nouveau la sentir... la tranquillité. Les âmes des ancêtres ont enfin trouvé la paix. Le Monolithe et ce monde sont désormais libérés du vice. » {n}L'Arlequin semble d'un coup complètement détendu.{/n} « N'oubliez pas notre accord, Cassia Orsellio. Je compte sur vous pour nous rendre les fragments ici même, et au plus vite. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, je peux de nouveau la sentir... la tranquillité. Les âmes des ancêtres ont enfin trouvé la paix. Le Monolithe et ce monde sont désormais libérés du vice. » {n}L'arlequin semble d'un coup complètement détendu.{/n} « N'oubliez pas notre accord, Cassia Orsellio. Je compte sur vous pour nous rendre les fragments ici même, et au plus vite. »

languages.text: «Ah, puedo sentirla de nuevo... la tranquilidad. Las almas ancestrales han encontrado la paz, y la corrupción ya no supone un riesgo para el Monolito ni para el mundo». {n}Los hombros estrechos del Arlequín parecen estar totalmente relajados.{/n} «Recuerda nuestro acuerdo, Cassia Orsellio. Volveremos a encontrarnos en este lugar para que nos hagas entrega de los fragmentos».
languages.original_text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, puedo sentirla de nuevo... la tranquilidad. Las almas ancestrales han encontrado la paz y los vicios ya no suponen un riesgo para el Monolito ni para el mundo». {n}Los hombros estrechos del Arlequín parecen estar totalmente relajados.{/n} «Recuerda nuestro acuerdo, Cassia Orsellio. Volveremos a encontrarnos en este lugar para que nos hagas entrega de los fragmentos».

languages.text: "Ah, ich spüre sie schon wieder ... die Ruhe. Die Seelen der Ahnen haben Frieden gefunden, die Verderbnis gefährdet den Monolithen und diese Welt nicht länger." {n}Die schmalen Schultern des Harlekins sehen jetzt völlig entspannt aus.{/n} "Denkt an unsere Vereinbarung, Cassia Orsellio. Wir werden uns bald wieder hier treffen, damit Ihr uns die Splitter gebt."
languages.original_text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, ich spüre sie schon wieder ... die Ruhe. Die Seelen der Ahnen haben Frieden gefunden, das Laster gefährdet den Monolithen und diese Welt nicht länger." {n}Die schmalen Schultern des Harlekins sehen jetzt völlig entspannt aus.{/n} "Denkt an unsere Vereinbarung, Cassia Orsellio. Wir werden uns bald wieder hier treffen, damit Ihr uns die Splitter gebt."

languages.text: "Ah... Yeniden sükûneti hissedebiliyorum. Atalarımızın ruhları huzura kavuştu. Artık ne Monolit ne de bu dünya, yozlaşma tehlikesiyle karşı karşıya." {n}Arleken'in dar omuzları, artık tamamen gevşemiş durumda.{/n} "Anlaşmamızı unutma Cassia Orsellio. Parçaları bize vermen için yakında yeniden burada buluşacağız."
languages.original_text: "Ah, I can feel it again... the tranquillity. The ancestral souls have found peace, and corruption no longer endangers the Monolith or this world." {n}The Harlequin's narrow shoulders now look completely relaxed.{/n} "Remember our agreement, Cassia Orsellio. We will soon meet in this place again so that you can give us the shards."

traits.locale_text: "Ah... Yeniden sükûneti hissedebiliyorum. Atalarımızın ruhları huzura kavuştu. Artık ne Monolit ne de bu dünya, yozlaşma tehlikesiyle karşı karşıya." {n}Arleken'in dar omuzları, artık tamamen gevşemiş durumda.{/n} "Anlaşmamızı unutma Cassia Orsellio. Parçaları bize vermen için yakında yeniden burada buluşacağız."
